title: SOLD: 1909-11 T206 Polar Bear Back - Zach Wheat HOF RC
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1909-11 T206 Polar Bear Back - Zach Wheat HOF RC
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is my one and only T206 card from my personal collection. This beauty is a 1909-11 T206 Polar Bear Back - Zach Wheat HOF Rookie Card which has been graded an SGC 50 by the strict graders at Sportscard Guaranty Company, the industry leader in third-party grading. Please review scan of the card for condition details and please note that the Polar Bear back is clean. Sale price on this beauty is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]

Phil,
I know that it is with a great deal of sadness that you part with your only beloved T206.  My thoughts are with you at this time.

Jeff
